name: Hot Take
description: Bold, contrarian single tweet that challenges conventional wisdom with a provocative stance
use_when: Making a provocative statement that sparks debate
Starting a conversation with a strong opinion

examples: Hot take: Most 'authentic' LinkedIn posts are just performative vulnerability.
Unpopular opinion: Your newsletter doesn't need 10K subscribers to make $100K/year.

reason.purpose: The one-sentence WHY that makes it credible
guidelines: Use concrete example or stat if possible

patterns: [Claim]. Nobody wants to hear this but [reason].

forbidden_patterns: Don't be contrarian just for engagement - need genuine insight
Avoid 'let that sink in' or 'read that again'
Don't make it so hot it's undefendable
No virtue signaling disguised as hot take
examples: Hot take: Your 'comprehensive guide' blog posts aren't ranking because Google prioritizes experience over word count now.
Unpopular opinion: Most founders should delete their Twitter and focus on one platform. Multi-platform is a growth killer.
